name: Dr. Jane Smith
bio: Dr. Jane Smith is a leading cardiologist with over 12 years of experience in treating heart conditions, specializing in preventive cardiology and advanced treatments.

name: Dr. Michael Lee
bio: Dr. Michael Lee focuses on dermatological treatments and skin care, with expertise in allergies, chronic skin conditions, and cosmetic dermatology.
